item.title: Tom Lee Predicts Ethereum to Reach $60,000 in 5 Years, with Over 2x Upside Potential by Year-End
item.description: On August 28th, Tom Lee, the chairman of BitMine, stated in an exclusive interview with Mario Nawfal that "the financial system will be reconstructed based on blockchain, similar to the moment when the US dollar departed from the gold standard in 1971. Ethereum will be one of the major beneficiaries. I still have a very bullish attitude towards Bitcoin and believe it could reach $200,000 or even higher. Regarding Ethereum, I think it has greater upside potential. With the development of blockchain and artificial intelligence, it has more potential. Therefore, we regard Ethereum as the largest macro opportunity in the next 10 to 15 years. I think from now until the end of the year, Bitcoin has the potential for a 2x increase, while Ethereum has more than a 2x increase. However, in the long term, we have conducted some research and envisioned a five-year experiment, and the result predicts that Ethereum's ultimate price will be around $60,000. Therefore, Ethereum has tremendous upside po

item.title: Federal Reserve Chair 11 Candidates to Undergo Interviews on September 1
item.description: On August 28th, U.S. Treasury Secretary Yellen stated that there are 11 highly capable candidates for the position of the Chairmanship of the Federal Reserve. After Labor Day (which falls on September 1st this year), we will commence the interview process and submit the final list to President Trump.

item.title: Cumberland is suspected to have sold approximately 47,000 ETH tonight, worth over $210 million.
item.description: On August 28th, as monitored by Whale Alert, Cumberland transferred 22,289 ETH to Coinbase Institutional approximately 3 minutes ago, with a value of approximately $103 million.BlockBeats had previously reported that approximately 3 and a half hours ago, Cumberland transferred 25,200 ETH to Coinbase Institutional, worth about $116 million.

item.title: Incremental funding continues to flow into the crypto ecosystem, with Tether and Circle minting a total of $1.25 billion in stablecoins today.
item.description: On August 28th, based on the data from LookOnChain, Tether minted an additional 1 billion USDT today, and Circle minted an additional 250 million USDC. In the past month, Tether and Circle have together minted a total of $8.75 billion worth of stablecoins.An increase in on-chain minted stablecoins generally reflects a growing demand for stablecoins and heightened user participation. It is often correlated with bullish sentiment in the crypto market, suggesting that more funds are flowing into the crypto ecosystem.

item.title: Falconedge Bets on BTC to Become Institutional Finance Cornerstone in the Next Decade, Plans to Build Bitcoin Treasury with IPO Proceeds
item.description: On August 28th, according to reports from financefeeds (https://www.financefeeds.com), Falconedge, a newly spun-off hedge fund advisory firm from UK hedge fund Falcon Investment Management, has completed its pre-IPO financing. It plans to pursue a bold Bitcoin treasury strategy, allocating almost all the upcoming IPO proceeds to building a Bitcoin treasury.Falconedge CEO Roy Kashi stated, "By making Bitcoin the company's primary reserve asset, Falconedge is betting that BTC will become the cornerstone of institutional finance in the next decade." Falconedge's IPO is expected to take place in September.

item.title: Institutional Ethereum Holdings Overview: Leader Bitmine and SharpLink Maintain Top Two Spots
item.description: On August 28th, based on strategicethreserve data, the following are the treasury companies and institutions with significant changes in Ethereum holdings in the past 30 days:Bitmine Immersion Tech (BMNR) takes the first place, currently holding 1.7 million ETH, with a value of approximately $7.95 billion and a 30-day holding increase of 202.4%;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) ranks second, currently holding 0.7977 million ETH, valued at approximately $3.7 billion and a 30-day holding increase of 121.1%;The Ether Machine (ETHM) comes in third, currently holding 0.3454 million ETH, valued at approximately $1.6 billion and a 30-day holding increase of 8.01%;Ethereum Foundation ranks fourth, holding 0.2316 million ETH, valued at approximately $1.007 billion and a 30-day holding decrease of 2.1%;Bit Digital (BTBT) ranks seventh, holding 0.1203 million ETH, valued at approximately $557.9 million with no change in holdings in the past 30 days;ETHZilla (ETHZ) ranks eighth, holding 0.1022 million

item.title: DOLO Surges to $0.297 After Listing on Binance Spot Trading
item.description: On August 28th, according to market data, Dolomite (DOLO) saw a significant surge after being listed on Binance Spot Trading. It reached a price of $0.297 and is currently trading at $0.268. The current market capitalization is $70 million, and the 24-hour gain has narrowed to 28%. The contract funding rate is currently -0.2%.

item.title: Stablecoin giants Circle and Paxos are currently testing a new cryptocurrency issuance verification technology
item.description: On August 27th, as reported by Bloomberg, the stablecoin giants Circle and Paxos are conducting tests on a new cryptocurrency issuance verification technology. This technology is aimed at assisting entities in verifying their digital asset holdings. Circle and Paxos are collaborating with the financial technology startup Bluprynt, which was founded by Georgetown Law professor Chris Brummer. By utilizing cryptography and blockchain technology, they provide issuer verification during the issuance of a stablecoin, enabling the tracking of the token back to the verified issuer.

item.title: Solana Ecosystem LST Protocol Sanctum Launches V2 Version
item.description: On August 27th, the LST protocol Sanctum within the Solana ecosystem launched its V2 version. This includes new product updates as well as a brand new website and a dedicated landing page.

item.title: Bankless Co-founder: ETH is an Institutional-Grade Investment Asset, Unlocking the Vast World of TradFi to New Heights
item.description: On August 27th, Ryan Sean Adams, a co-founder of Bankless, stated, "During this cycle, ETH has demonstrated itself to be a high-quality liquid asset (HQLA), similar to US treasuries, gold, and Bitcoin. This will unlock a vast world of traditional finance (TradFi) capital and drive ETH to new heights as an institutional-grade investment asset."
